title: Pel√© ganha homenagens em dia que marca um ano de sua morte
text:
Santos e Conmebol prestam suas homenagens ao Rei Pel√©; missa e proje√ß√£o de camisas no Cristo Redentor ainda v√£o acontecer
Nesta sexta-feira, 29, faz um ano que a morte de Edson Arantes do Nascimento foi confirmada. Para homenagear a falta que o Rei do Futebol faz, Pel√© vem recebendo declara√ß√µes e exalta√ß√µes de diversas pessoas e entidades, principalmente do time que defendeu em quase toda sua carreira e trouxe muitas alegrias, o Santos, al√©m da Conmebol.
Durante toda a sexta-feira, 29, Pel√© ser√° homenageado em diversas cerim√¥nias religiosas na cidade de Tr√™s Cora√ß√µes, em Minas Gerais, onde nasceu, al√©m de uma missa no Santu√°rio do Cristo Redentor, no Rio de Janeiro. Existe uma previs√£o de uma grande movimenta√ß√£o de admiradores do Rei no mausol√©u onde est√° sepultado, em Santos.
Ver essa foto no Instagram
O dia 29 de dezembro de 2022 marcou o fim de uma vida brilhante, v√≠tima de uma fal√™ncia m√∫ltipla dos √≥rg√£os pela progress√£o de um c√¢ncer no c√≥lon e infec√ß√£o respirat√≥ria. O √≠dolo ficou um m√™s internado no Hospital Albert Einstein, na cidade de S√£o Paulo, onde veio a falecer aos 82 anos de idade.
‚Äú29 de dezembro de 2022. A data que ningu√©m gostaria de lembrar, mas que deve ser reverenciada. O mundo chorava por um homem e a imortalidade se tornava real. S√≠mbolo de genialidade, de excel√™ncia, de perfei√ß√£o. A hist√≥ria marcada por 1.116 jogos, os 1.091 gols, os 45 t√≠tulos pelo Santos FC. Com um simples apelido, um n√∫mero 10 nas costas e assim se tornou o maior de todos os tempos. Um Rei para sempre‚Äù, escreveu o Santos, em sua homenagem ao maior jogador de todos os tempos do clube e do futebol.

Confedera√ß√£o Sul-Americana de Futebol. Atrav√©s das redes sociais, a Conmebol publicou uma ilustra√ß√£o de Pel√© com uma camisa verde amarela, uma coroa e alguns trof√©us, principalmente as ta√ßas do tricampeonato da Copa do Mundo. ‚ÄúUm ano sem o eterno rei! Pel√© deu vida √† camisa 10, transcendeu fronteiras e mudou a hist√≥ria do futebol. Sua genialidade em campo mostrou ao mundo o melhor do talento sul-americano. Inigual√°vel. Incompar√°vel. O dono de um legado √∫nico e imortal‚Äù, disseram.
Al√©m disso, a imagem do Cristo Redentor receber√° algumas proje√ß√µes de camisas usadas ao longo da carreira de Pel√©. O Papa Francisco enviou uma mensagem em homenagem ao jogador que ser√° lida por Dom Orani Tempesta, Arcebispo do Rio de Janeiro, durante a missa celebrada √†s 19h30 com o reitor do Santu√°rio do Cristo Redentor, o padre Omar Raposo.

Muitas homenagens para relembrar o um ano do falecimento do craque est√£o acontecendo. O Memorial Necr√≥pole Ecum√™nica, em Santos, preparou em dezembro um esquema especial para receber os f√£s do jogador. Al√©m disso, no √∫ltimo dia 25 de dezembro, a C√¢mara dos Deputados aprovou um projeto de lei que institui que o dia 19 de novembro ser√° oficialmente o Dia do Rei Pel√©, escolhida por ter sido a data na qual Edson Arantes do Nascimento marcou seu mil√©simo gol, em 1969, contra o Vasco, em pleno Maracan√£.

author: VNExplorer
title: Gary Neville mocks furious Arsenal fans after controversial VAR West Ham goal
text:
Gary Neville has mocked Arsenal fans who have been left fuming by the decision to award West Ham‚Äôs opening goal on Thursday night.
Gabriel and Oleksandr Zinchenko failed to clear the ball from a cross into the box, with the ball falling to Jarrod Bowen. The Hammers star reached for it, tapping it back to team-mate Tomas Soucek, who fired past David Raya.
That put David Moyes ‚Äò side a goal up, despite Arsenal having dominated possession up to that point. The goal was checked extensively by VAR Craig Pawson, with replays appearing to show the ball had gone out.
But with Bowen‚Äôs body blocking a clear view of the ball, Pawson directed referee Michael Oliver to award the goal. That sparked Neville into life, with the Manchester United defender taking full advantage of the chance to mock Gunners fans.
Neville had previously filmed a segment for Sky Sports showing how the ball can be in even if it looks out. At the time, one Arsenal fan tweeted: ‚ÄúGary Neville made a segment on live television talking about how spheres work and then Joe Willock came out and told the ball went out.‚Äù
The pundit responded to that tweet on Thursday night with 24 laughing face emojis. He followed that up by tweeting a photo of a ball that looked to be out but was in from his film, with the caption being the magnifying class emoji.
HAVE YOUR SAY! Should West Ham‚Äôs goal against Arsenal have stood? Comment below.
Jarrod Bowen blocks the VAR before Tomas Soucek‚Äôs opener at Arsenal
One Arsenal fan did not take kindly to the mocking though, replying: ‚ÄúYou were the worst full back in the PL.‚Äù Neville delivered a customarily witty comeback, writing: ‚ÄúAgreed but great at goal line technology.‚Äù
He did have good news for the Gunners, despite them going into half-time a goal down. Neville wrote: ‚ÄúOn a positive note for Arsenal the front 3 are playing narrower and closer to each other to combine. They look dangerous!‚Äù
Former Rangers star Ally McCoist was unsure that the ball had stayed in, admitting the replays were inconclusive. McCoist said on Amazon Prime TV: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a tough one. That is going to be a tough one, whether it‚Äôs gone out or not. That looks‚Ä¶ what do we think? That looks out to me.‚Äù
After seeing a different angle, he added ‚ÄúIt looks in there! That frame it looks out, but it‚Äôs hidden (the ball). Clearly, Bowen is hiding the part of the ball that we really want to see, his right leg is covering the line.
‚ÄúIt makes it extremely difficult for us. I‚Äôd very, very hopeful whoever is looking at it has another angle because you can‚Äôt see it. His right leg, his right thigh, is actually covering (the view).‚Äù
Join our new WhatsApp community! Click this link to receive your daily dose of Mirror Football content. We also treat our community members to special offers, promotions, and adverts from us and our partners. If you don‚Äôt like our community, you can check out any time you like. If you‚Äôre curious, you can read our Privacy Notice.

author: Carol Salazar
title: Mujer fue presionada a hacerse una ligadura de trompas en M√°laga: una comisaria de familia ser√≠a la responsable - Infobae
text:
La ligadura de trompas es un proceso de anticoncepci√≥n definitivo - cr√©dito visualesIA/Infobae La Procuradur√≠a General de la Naci√≥n puso la lupa sobre un caso de presunto constre√±imiento ilegal del que habr√≠a sido v√≠ctima una mujer en medio de un proceso de restablecimiento de derechos del que deb√≠a beneficiarse.
De acuerdo con el organismo de control, la ciudadana Mar√≠a Isabel Ni√±o fue violentada en sus derechos cuando estaba haciendo los tr√°mites necesarios con la Comisar√≠a de M√°laga (Santander) para que su hijo, que estaba en un hogar sustituto, le fuera devuelto.
En medio del proceso, presuntamente, la comisaria Sileidy Katherine Pe√±a Palencia habr√≠a presionado a la mujer para que se sometiera a un proceso quir√∫rgico o, de lo contrario, no le regresar√≠a a su hijo . Al parecer, la funcionaria le dijo que deb√≠a hacerse una ligadura de trompas para no tener m√°s hijos y as√≠ garantizar el retorno del menor de edad.
Ahora puede seguirnos en nuestro WhatsApp Channel y en Facebook .
De acuerdo con Profamilia, la ligadura de trompas es un m√©todo de anticoncepci√≥n que se lleva a cabo por medio de una laparoscopia y que implica la cauterizaci√≥n de las trompas de Falopio para evitar que el √≥vulo llegue al √∫tero. A pesar de que es un m√©todo definitivo, existe una manera de revertirlo: a trav√©s de la recanalizaci√≥n de las trompas.
Ahora bien, el acceso a este procedimiento debe ser consentido y voluntario, contrario a lo que habr√≠a pasado con la ciudadana Mar√≠a Isabel Ni√±o. Por eso, la Procuradur√≠a profiri√≥ pliego de cargos contra la comisaria en cuesti√≥n y contin√∫a con la investigaci√≥n para determinar las sanciones por presuntas faltas disciplinarias .
La ligadura de trompas implica la cauterizaci√≥n de las trompas de falopio para evitar que el √≥vulo llegue al √∫tero - cr√©dito Alcald√≠a de Bogot√° ‚ÄúEl Ministerio P√∫blico verifica la posible vulneraci√≥n de la servidora p√∫blica de los principios de moralidad, lo cual conlleva su responsabilidad por tener una conducta integra y respetuosa. De esta manera, la Procuradur√≠a Provincial de Bucaramanga calific√≥ la presunta falta de Pe√±a Palencia como grav√≠sima, a t√≠tulo de dolo ‚Äù, indic√≥ el organismo de inspecci√≥n y vigilancia en un comunicado.
Cabe resaltar que la conducta de constre√±imiento ilegal tambi√©n est√° tipificada en el C√≥digo Penal Colombiano y se define de la siguiente manera: ‚Äú El que, fuera de los casos especialmente previstos como delito, constri√±a a otro a hacer, tolerar u omitir alguna cosa‚Äù. Quien incurra en este delito, podr√≠a ser privado de la libertad entre 16 y 36 meses, de acuerdo con la normativa.
La anticoncepci√≥n forzada en el conflicto Mujeres en Colombia fueron sometidas a la anticoncepci√≥n forzada en medio del conflicto armado - cr√©dito Europa Press El hecho de obligar a las mujeres a utilizar m√©todos anticonceptivos no es algo nuevo en Colombia. Durante el conflicto armado, varias mujeres fueron sometidas a la esterilizaci√≥n forzada que, seg√∫n la Comisi√≥n para el Esclarecimiento de la Verdad, es una de las formas de violencia reproductiva menos documentada en el pa√≠s.
Diferentes grupos armados reclutaron a menores de edad que despu√©s fueron sometidas a intervenciones para que no tuvieran la posibilidad de quedar en embarazo. ‚Äú Nos mandaban a capar para que no tuvi√©ramos hijos. Y eso lo hicieron en el hospital. Se llegaba y se les ped√≠a a las mujeres que iban a la jornada de desconexi√≥n, porque es que como nosotras √©ramos unas burras, unas perras pariendo. Saben que somos de pueblo y las mujeres de pueblo tenemos que tener nuestros hijos‚Äù, cont√≥ una lideresa de Santa Marta, cuyo testimonio fue recogido por el Centro Nacional de Memoria Hist√≥rica.
Las AUC fueron responsables de la anticoncepci√≥n forzada de mujeres civiles en C√≥rdoba y Magdalena - cr√©dico Consejo Regional de Ind√≠genas del Cauca Seg√∫n detall√≥ la Comisi√≥n de la Verdad, el Centro de Derechos Reproductivos hizo una revisi√≥n de m√°s de 60 informes p√∫blicos y encontr√≥ que el grupo paramilitar Autodefensas Campesinas del Casanare y el Bloque Norte fueron responsables de varios casos de anticoncepci√≥n forzada en Colombia. Adem√°s, las mujeres que ejerc√≠an trabajo sexual en diferentes zonas del pa√≠s tambi√©n fueron obligadas por los paramilitares a utilizar m√©todos anticonceptivos .
Por su parte, hombres armados del Bloque Norte de las AUC de C√≥rdoba y Magdalena somet√≠an a mujeres civiles a la esclavitud sexual y, cuando quedaban en embarazo, las hac√≠an pasar por procedimientos de aborto forzado.

author: Sarah Broadway
title: NWS confirms at least 4 tornados touched down in North Alabama during Wednesday's storms | News | waaytv.com
text: The National Weather Service in Huntsville say at least four tornadoes touched down in North Alabama during Wednesday's severe weather outbreak. A tornado touched down in the Henagar area in Jackson County Wednesday night. The EF-2 tornado touched down between County Road 425 and 322 at 10:54 p.m. three miles southeast of Pisgah. The tornado had a path stretching 10.22 miles long and 880 yards wide. Wind speeds peaked at 135 mph. The tornado ended at 11:20 p.m. three miles northwest of Hammondville in DeKalb County. According to the NWS, seven people were injured during the tornado. Officials say the tornado caused widespread damage including overturning a camper, partially destroying a home, and moving a mobile home off its foundation. The NWS says an EF-1 tornado touched down in the Old Town area in Madison County Wednesday night. The tornado started three miles northeast of Huntsville near Walker Avenue at 9:28 p.m. and ended at 9:32 p.m. four miles east, northeast of Huntsville. Wind speeds reached 105 mph. The path was 2.38 miles long and 600 yards wide. The NWS says several large trees were uprooted in the tornado and that the debris signature continued southeast over Monte Sano. No injuries were reported. Another tornado touched down in the McMullen Cove area, according to the NWS. Officials say the EF-2 tornado touched down just north of Little Cove Road four miles west of Gurley. It started at 9:44 p.m. and had a path .87 miles long and 275 yards wide. Wind speeds reached 122 mph. The tornado ended at 9:48 p.m. three miles west of Gurley. Zero injuries were reported. Some of the damage included siding peeling off a garage and partially uplifted roofs on four homes on Kenhurst Lane SE. Another tornado touched down in the Brigadoon area in Limestone County. The NWS said that tornado was an EF-3. It started at 8:23 p.m. where it touched down on the Tennessee River just east of where the Elk River meets it and then moved inland toward the Brigadoon neighborhood. The tornado had a path 2.22 miles long and .13 miles wide with wind speeds reaching 136 mph. The tornado ended at 8:30 p.m. eight miles north of Hillsboro. The NWS says no injuries were reported. Storm damage included a home with exterior walls that collapsed and part of the roof gone. Homes nearby had substantial roof damage, trees were uprooted, and vehicles were damaged.

author: Jon Dougherty
title: Michelle Obama Seen Handing Out Free Soda Samples At Costco
text:
Michelle Obama delighted shoppers at a Costco in Livermore, CA, by promoting her new healthy beverage, Plezi Fizz.
A TikTok video shared on Tuesday captured the former first lady standing in front of a substantial display of the drinks, which were launched in March.
Customers gathered around Michelle and her bodyguard, eager to take photos, the DailyMail.com reported. Several photos were also posted to social media.
Michelle Obama at my Costco today giving out samples pic.twitter.com/UgYgF8J6Jv
‚Äî ùï∂ùñéùñóùñáùñò (@BasedKirby) September 18, 2024
@shakeandstirco2024 Costco in livermore! #costcodeals ‚ô¨ original sound ‚Äì Shake&Stir
In the 25-second video, Michelle Obama informed the audience that the beverage was healthy, calorie-free, and delicious. A Costco employee named Oscaldo told DailyMail.com that the event took place on Wednesday, during which Obama was promoting her new business.
Michelle Obama serves as the co-founder and strategic partner of Plezi Nutrition. According to the brand‚Äôs website, she is guiding the company to become a leader in creating healthy food and beverage brands, the outlet reported.
On the company‚Äôs website, she noted in a statement: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre starting with a beverage because we know how much concern parents and pediatricians have about sugary drinks.‚Äù
Plezi Fizz comes in three flavors: Lemon Lime Squeeze, Cherry Limeade and Strawberry Lemonade. They reportedly contain 70 percent less sugar than other leading fruit juices.
Earlier this summer, the former first lady sent a gaslighting message to black Americans that voting in the November elections is ‚Äúcritical‚Äù to protecting their ‚Äúfreedom.‚Äù
‚ÄúJuneteenth is all about celebrating our collective freedom and fighting to protect it,‚Äù Obama said in a video posted on X.
‚ÄúOur power, our rights, and even our planet are on the ballot this year,‚Äù Obama said. ‚ÄúSo, now is the time to think about how you‚Äôre going to make your voice heard in this election.‚Äù
The desperate message comes as recent polling shows that former President Donald Trump may be on the verge of capturing a historic number of votes from black Americans.
The former first lady established the voter registration and engagement organization ‚ÄúWhen We All Vote‚Äù in 2018, and pushed her 22 million followers on X to visit the group‚Äôs website.
‚ÄúGet yourself registered to vote, and then text three friends to do the same,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúDo not sit on the sidelines this year, because this is a critical moment for all of us.‚Äù
WATCH:
On Juneteenth, we celebrate our freedom, our resilience, and our progress. Today we‚Äôre honoring all the Black folks who came before us ‚Äì who helped build our country with their bare hands ‚Äì who marched and fought to do everything they could to build a better future for us all.‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/NmdjgcUK3t
‚Äî Michelle Obama (@MichelleObama) June 19, 2024
During a January interview on Jay Shetty‚Äôs ‚ÄúOn Purpose‚Äù podcast, Obama put out another over-the-top call to action, claiming she was ‚Äúterrified about what could possibly happen‚Äù in the election.
‚ÄúBecause our leaders matter,‚Äù she then said. ‚ÄúWho we select, who speaks for us, who holds that bully pulpit ‚Äî it affects us in ways that sometimes I think people take for granted.‚Äù
In March, Obama‚Äôs office confirmed again that she ‚Äúwill not be running for president,‚Äù as many had speculated she would amid disturbingly low poll numbers for Biden.
‚ÄúAs former first lady Michelle Obama has expressed several times over the years, she will not be running for president,‚Äù Crystal Carson, director of communications for Obama‚Äôs office, told NBC News at the time.
‚ÄúMrs. Obama supports President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris‚Äô re-election campaign,‚Äù she added.
Others continued to predict that the former first lady would eventually throw her hat into the ring, but that was before President Biden chose to end his reelection bid and essentially anoint Harris as his successor, which the Democratic Party officially did at its August convention.

author: @record_mexico
title: ¬°Lomito soldado! Festejan cumplea√±os de 'Arkadas', perrito del ej√©rcito mexicano
text: ¬°Lomito soldado! Festejan cumplea√±os de 'Arkadas', perrito del ej√©rcito mexicano Los elementos caninos son una parte importante del [ej√©rcito mexicano](https://www.record.com.mx/contra/ejercito-mexicano-se-encargara-de-remodelar-el-estadio-de-beisbol-kukulcan), es por eso que a los ['lomitos'](https://www.record.com.mx/empelotados/puppy-bowl-2023-evento-para-concientizar-la-adopcion-de-animales) se les festeja a lo grande, como fue con 'Arkadas', quien celebr√≥ su [cumplea√±os.](https://www.record.com.mx/empelotados/nino-de-cuatro-anos-festeja-su-cumpleanos-con-tematica-de-santiago-gimenez) En el v√≠deo compartido en redes sociales, se puede ver qu√© decenas de personas se encuentran cantando las tradicionales ma√±anitas mientras el canino degusta su pastel de cumplea√±os. Este apenas es el primer a√±o de vida de la todav√≠a cachorra 'Arkadas', pero se espera que pase muchos a√±os m√°s acompa√±ada del ejercicio mexicano al cual lleg√≥ hace casi siete meses, cuando fue donada por Turqu√≠a en se√±al de agradecimiento al pueblo mexicano. [TAMBI√âN TE PUEDE INTERESAR: L√ìPEZ OBRADOR PROMETE REFORMA A SALARIOS M√çNIMOS Y AFORES](https://www.record.com.mx/contra/lopez-obrador-promete-reforma-a-salarios-minimos-y-afores) Arkadas se uni√≥ al ej√©rcito mexicano el pasado mes de mayo y a√∫n se encuentra en el proceso de adiestramiento que va muy bien, por lo que en un par de meses seguramente estar√° en los aeropuertos como parte de la revisi√≥n.

author: Kaitlyn Budion
title: Maine Connectivity Authority launches program to reach Mainers without internet
text: Maine Connectivity Authority launches program to reach Mainers without internet The Maine Connectivity Authority is launching a new program it said will bring internet access to everyone in Maine. Through its Working Internet ASAP program, the authority will purchase low-earth orbit satellite hardware, and allow users to access the internet through Starlink. The program is aimed at reaching the 9,000 homes and businesses in Maine that don't have access to any internet service, said authority president Arthur Butcher. "The Working Internet ASAP, is one step to ensure a fast option for anyone who doesn't have it, but certainly the progress, while substantial, our work still won't be done," Butcher said. The authority will also invest another $350 million in broadband infrastructure across the state, he said. That program is directed to the 5% of the state with unreliable internet service. Butcher said while work continues on expanding broadband infrastructure, in the meantime, the Working Internet ASAP program will help connect those with no other option. "So this program right now is a way to ensure that those 9,000 locations that have no other option are not stranded in the digital dark, while we put the rest of federal funding to work," he said. Applications for the program open in November, Butcher said. The authority is planning outreach in eligible communities, and will offer an over-the-phone application option.

author: Nishikant Karlikar
title: Thane synagogue gets hoax bomb threat email | Thane News - Times of India
text: THANE: A 144-year-old Jewish synagogue in Thane received a bomb threat email on Thursday afternoon. Though the threat later turned out to be a hoax, police stepped up vigil outside Shaar Hashamaim - Gate of Heaven Synagogue in Charai's Dhobi Ali area.A preliminary probe found that the email had been sent from the US. \"The IP address seems to be from the US. We are trying to track down the sender,\" said Ravi Kshirsagar, senior inspector, Naupada police station. The bomb threat email assumes importance in the wake of the IED explosion outside the Israeli Embassy.Complainant Samual Daniel (64) told Naupada police that around 12.20pm, one of the trustees spotted the threat email which read: \"I planted bombs inside of your synagogue. The explosives are well hidden and they will go off soon. We will make sure you all end up dead. We are a terrorist group called: Fuming.\"The trustee alerted Naupada police and the Israel consulate. Police rushed a bomb detection and disposal squad to the spot and evacuated the staff at the prayer centre. They cordoned off the area, diverted traffic and instructed commercial establishments to down their shutters for a brief period. \"We carried out a thorough search and did not find anything suspicious. However, security has been stepped up in the area,\" said DCP Ganesh Gawade. Police have regi-stered an FIR under the releva-nt Indian Penal Code sections.The foundation stone for the synagogue was laid on March 26, 1878, and the building was completed on December 29, 1879. In 1999, the synagogue was renovated and beautified. Daniel said the Thane synagogue is an important centre of Jewish community activities. He added that around 40% of the Jewish population in India reside in and around Thane city and most of them offer prayers at Shaar Hashamaim.
